dataObjects.description:
Batrochoglanis raninus .

FRENCH GUIANA . MNHN (A9942) , Syntype , Rio La Mana (70.4). BRAZIL . Amazonas : MZUSP 6333 , lago Castro, rio Purus mouth , 78.xi.1967 (50.0) ; MZUSP 23376 , igarapeManduacu , parana de IUPIA , NW de Fonte Boa , 8-9. x.1968 (8 ex., 49.2-75.0) ; MZUSP 23407 , igarape Tucuxi, Ati-Parana , NW de Fonte Boa , 10.x.1968 (24 ex., 21.7-74.4) . Pará : MZUSP 22126 , rio Utinga, Belem , no date (7 ex., 27.9-38.5) ; MZUSP 22263 , Paissandu, Oriximina , x-xi.1959 , (31.3) ; MZUSP 23023 , rio Arani, Arari falls, Ilha de Marajo , vii.1965 (33.2) ; MZUSP 23029 , igarapeApeu , Boa Vista, Castanhal , vii.1965 (39.2) ; MZUSP 23659 , igarape Jaramacaru, affluent of rio Cumina , 29.ix-1.x.1969 (13 ex., 16.5-29.4) . Rondônia : INPA 9522 , rio Guapore , 5 km upstream Costa Marques , 20.xi.1983 (33.2) . PERU : Depto Loreto : AMNH 78053 , Rio Tahuayo, affluent of Rio Amazonas, Huasi village , 8-9.vii.1987 (4 ex., 33.7-42.7).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Commonly occurs in creeks as well as in rivers (Ref. 27188).  Found in very shady and deep zones of rivers where the current is slow, the bottom is shady and the gravel is covered with plant debris.  During the day, it lies hidden under branches or rocks.  It goes stalk-hunting, swallowing prey within its range.  Starts feeding on micro-crustaceans and aquatic insect larvae, then shifts it diet to fishes of notable size (Ref. 35381).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Amazon River basin: Bolivia, Brazil, French Guiana, Guyana, Peru and Suriname.

The following is a representative barcode sequence, the centroid of all available sequences for this species.


There is 1 barcode sequence available from BOLD and GenBank.

Below is the sequence of the barcode region Cytochrome oxidase subunit 1 (COI or COX1) from a member of the species.

See the BOLD taxonomy browser for more complete information about this specimen.

Other sequences that do not yet meet barcode criteria may also be available.
